files.description: Defines the versioned results schema, provides runtime validation/coercion helpers, and exposes a single function to build a compliant /outputs/results.json payload.
Implements seed pinning across Python/numpy/random/torch (if present) and centralizes deterministic matplotlib plotting defaults to ensure reproducible figures.
Writes validated results.json and deterministic figure files to /outputs, embedding schema_version, run metadata, and content hashes for regression testing.
End-to-end runnable pipeline entrypoint that applies determinism settings, executes the experiment(s), generates deterministic plots, and emits a schema-compliant outputs/results.json.
JSON Schema document for results.json v1 used for validation in code and tests.
Pytest suite verifying results.json payloads validate against v1 schema and reject missing/incorrect fields while preserving schema_version behavior.
Pytest suite asserting fixed seeds and pinned matplotlib rcParams produce byte-stable or hash-stable figure outputs across repeated runs.
Documents the results.json stable schema, versioning policy, required fields, and determinism guarantees (seed + plotting parameters) for reproducible outputs.

missionDescription: Define a stable results schema (fields + version) for /outputs/results.json and enforce it in code + tests; pin randomness (seed) and plotting parameters to ensure figure determinism.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
